meanings.definition: The highest military rank in some countries, typically held by the supreme commander of the armed forces.
meanings.sent1: The generalissimo led the army into battle.
meanings.sent2: The generalissimo made important decisions for the military.
meanings.sent3: The generalissimo's hat was so big, it kept falling over his eyes.
meanings.sent4: In the chess game of war, the generalissimo was the most powerful piece.
meanings.sent5: The generalissimo's presence on the battlefield was awe-inspiring.

meanings.sent1: The brave generalissimo inspired his troops with his leadership.
meanings.sent2: The wise generalissimo strategized the army's movements.
meanings.sent3: The generalissimo always had a smile on his face, even in tough times.
meanings.sent4: She was the generalissimo of the household, making all the important decisions.
meanings.sent5: The generalissimo's uniform was adorned with medals of honor.
